about_the_game:
Dear Reader,

Enclosed is a copy of my bizarre rotating puzzle box game Steam Panic. I’d appreciate your being so good as to try it.

  • Award-winning gameplay mechanics of a clockwork box: rotate the playfield to combine blocks in tetraminos and move them;
  • 100+ intelligent puzzles with smoothly increasing difficulty: doors, saws, mines and portals;
  • Steampunk made with attention to details: from a cog to a skretchmark of a wall. And it sounds SOOO good;
  • Pure classical challenge without GMO in a casual wrap (remember, it's a puzzle game from 1935).

Yours,
Schrödinger's cat
